hero.title: From <highlight>proteome-wide binding</highlight> maps to real-world decisions in <highlight>drug development</highlight> & <highlight>precision medicine</highlight>
hero.subtitle: Precision Profiling, Driving Biotech Innovation

proteinMicroarray.title: Protein Microarray
points: High throughput, analyzing thousands of proteins at once.
Ideal for biomarker discovery and proteome-wide analysis.

elisa.title: ELISA
points: Low throughput, analyzing one protein at a time.
Standard for quantifying specific, known proteins.
